Instruction: Add diced tomatoes, chicken broth, and spices to the saucepan; stir well. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes or until the rice is cooked and liquid is absorbed.
Gradually pour water into the saucepan while stirring the rice. Mix in tomato powder, onion powder, and garlic powder.
Fluff rice with a fork before serving.
